name: C19HCCSARSRelatedQualitativeDetectionLaboratoryTests
title: C19HCC SARS related Qualitative Detection Laboratory Tests
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This value set includes laboratory tests used to detect SARS-related coronaviruses, with results provided on a qualitative scale.),(Data Element Scope: Used to identify laboratory-confirmed cases of COVID-19 infection.

SARS-related tests can arguably be used to detect SARS-CoV-2 because there is no known circulation of SARS-related coronaviruses at present.

Reference: WHO, Interim Guidance: Laboratory testing for 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) in suspected human cases; https://www.who.int/publications-detail/laboratory-testing-for-2019-novel-coronavirus-in-suspected-human-cases-20200117, published March 19 2020; WHO reference: WHO/COVID-19/laboratory/2020.5),(Inclusion Criteria: SARS-related detection tests with an expected qualitative result, e.g. detected/not detected.),(Exclusion Criteria: * SARS-CoV-2 specific tests.
* Quantitative tests.)
